titles.title: Monongahela Conservation Legacy Act of 2010
To designate certain Federal land within the Monongahela National Forest as a component of the National Wilderness Preservation System, and for other purposes.
Monongahela Conservation Legacy Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: Commodity Markets, Digital Assets, and Rural Development

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: Monongahela Conservation Legacy Act of 2010 - Designates the federal land within the Monongahela National Forest in West Virginia, to be known as the North Fork Mountain Wilderness, as a wilderness area for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System (NWPS).
